title: How to Change a Diaper in a Car

steps.headline: Get out of the car and open the boot (trunk).
Clear space in the boot for baby and check for sharp things.
Lay down a nappy (diaper) changing mat.
steps.description: If you don't have a mat you can use a carrier bag by carefully ripping the sides to make it big enough.

steps.headline: Lay new nappy down in middle of mat.
Place wet wipes and empty carrier bag by mat.
Lay baby down on changing mat or carrier bag.
steps.description: Make sure baby's bottom is positioned above new clean nappy.

steps.headline: Open dirty nappy and clean bottom with wet wipes.
steps.description: Keep adding dirty wet wipes into dirty nappy.

steps.headline: Whilst lifting, slide dirty nappy out.
steps.description: Baby will be on new clean nappy. Now apply a nice coat of skin protecting cream around baby's behind and genitals.

steps.headline: Place dirty nappy with wipes into nappy bag/carrier bag and tie up the bag.
Dispose of dirty nappy in the bag, if possible.
steps.description: Otherwise, keep in boot until see a bin.

steps.headline: Use antibacterial alcohol wash on hands.
Continue on journey with happy baby and parent.

text: Get out of the car and open the boot (trunk).  Clear space in the boot for baby and check for sharp things.  Lay down a nappy (diaper) changing mat. If you don't have a mat you can use a carrier bag by carefully ripping the sides to make it big enough. Lay new nappy down in middle of mat.  Place wet wipes and empty carrier bag by mat.  Get baby out of car.  Lay baby down on changing mat or carrier bag. Make sure baby's bottom is positioned above new clean nappy. Open dirty nappy and clean bottom with wet wipes. Keep adding dirty wet wipes into dirty nappy. Lift baby and clean behind.  Whilst lifting, slide dirty nappy out. Baby will be on new clean nappy. Now apply a nice coat of skin protecting cream around baby's behind and genitals. Place dirty nappy with wipes into nappy bag/carrier bag and tie up the bag.  Do up clean nappy.  Dispose of dirty nappy in the bag, if possible. Otherwise, keep in boot until see a bin. Use antibacterial alcohol wash on hands.  Kiss baby.  Place baby back in car.  Continue on journey with happy baby and parent.
sentences: Get out of the car and open the boot (trunk).
Clear space in the boot for baby and check for sharp things.
Lay down a nappy (diaper) changing mat.
If you don't have a mat you can use a carrier bag by carefully ripping the sides to make it big enough.
Lay new nappy down in middle of mat.
Place wet wipes and empty carrier bag by mat.
Get baby out of car.
Lay baby down on changing mat or carrier bag.
Make sure baby's bottom is positioned above new clean nappy.
Open dirty nappy and clean bottom with wet wipes.
Keep adding dirty wet wipes into dirty nappy.
Lift baby and clean behind.
Whilst lifting, slide dirty nappy out.
Baby will be on new clean nappy.
Now apply a nice coat of skin protecting cream around baby's behind and genitals.
Place dirty nappy with wipes into nappy bag/carrier bag and tie up the bag.
Do up clean nappy.
Dispose of dirty nappy in the bag, if possible.
Otherwise, keep in boot until see a bin.
Use antibacterial alcohol wash on hands.
Kiss baby.
Place baby back in car.
Continue on journey with happy baby and parent.
